solution_line_template: The total money from the quarters is {num_quarters} * ${value_per_quarter} = ${total_money_quarters}<<{num_quarters}*{value_per_quarter}={total_money_quarters}>>{total_money_quarters}
The total money from the dimes is {num_dimes} * ${value_per_dime} = ${total_money_dimes}<<{num_dimes}*{value_per_dime}={total_money_dimes}>>{total_money_dimes}

The total money from the nickels is ${total_money_all_coins} - ${total_money_quarters} - ${total_money_dimes} = ${total_money_nickels}<<{total_money_all_coins}-{total_money_quarters}-{total_money_dimes}={total_money_nickels}>>{total_money_nickels}
The number of nickels Kendall has is ${total_money_nickels} / ${value_per_nickel} = <<{total_money_nickels}/{value_per_nickel}={num_nickels}>>{num_nickels} nickels
